NoSuchProviderException(java.lang.String.Description: Constructs a NoSuchProviderException with the specified detail message. A detail message is a String that describes this particular exception.

NoSuchProviderException().Description: Constructs a NoSuchProviderException with no detail message. A detail message is a String that describes this particular exception.

ClassDesc: This exception is thrown when a particular security provider is requested but is not available in the environment.
